events.message: I recently purchased a blender from your store, but it stopped working after just two days. I would like to request a refund as this is very disappointing.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund due to their request for money back following a faulty product.
The case was assigned to agent Linda for further handling of the refund request.
Hello! I’m Linda from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your blender. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the payment method you used? This will help us process your refund quickly.
My order number is 349857, and I paid with my credit card. I really hope you can resolve this soon because the product is unusable.
Thank you for the information. We have initiated your refund, and you should see the amount credited back to your credit card within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and processing my refund. I appreciate your help and hope future products last longer.
We’re glad we could resolve your issue promptly. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to ensure your refund has been received and that you are satisfied with the resolution provided.
I confirm the refund has arrived in my account. Thanks for the great support!
The case has been closed following confirmation that the refund was received and the customer is satisfied.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on their support experience.
